entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
